summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingDrunk Elephant's Beste No. 9 Jelly Cleanser is an innovative face wash that removes all traces of makeup, excess oil, pollution, and any other grime from the day.
details: DetailsBenefitsUnique blend of mild surfactants and makeup-dissolving emollientsLight foam rinses away without an ounce of residueLeaves skin feeling clean and softEffectively dissolves even stubborn makeup, sunscreen, and oilsDermatologist TestedFormulated at a skin-friendly, non-stripping pH of 5.5Formulated without the Suspicious 6 - the six ingredients Drunk Elephant believes are at the root of almost every skin issue (Essential oils, Silicones, Chemical sunscreens, SLS, Fragrances + dyes, and Drying alcohols)Key IngredientsMild Surfactant Blend: Mild cleansing agents, including coconut-based surfactants rich in fatty acids, work together to create a gentle lather that effectively dissolves even stubborn makeup, sunscreen, and oils while supporting a healthy skin barrierGlycerin: A skin-identical humectant, glycerin helps replenish hydration levels that are normally lost in skin during the cleansing processCantaloupe Fruit Extract: Rich in antioxidants, this extract soothes and hydratesResearch ResultsIn a consumer-perception study with 106 people after 1 day:99% agreed skin felt free of impurities and surface debris97% agreed Beste was non-irritating to skin93% agreed skin felt balanced, soft, and suppleItem 2588440How To UseSqueeze into your palm and gently massage over wet or dry skin.Add water to lather.Rinse well and pat dry.Use nightly or in alternation with other Drunk Elephant cleansers.Tip: Drunk Elephant recommends skipping the morning cleanse, as it's not necessary if you've cleansed your skin the night before.How to Recycle:No need to disassemble. The whole thing is recyclable!IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Coco-Glucoside, Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Sodium Methyl Oleoyl Taurate, Propanediol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Glycolipids, Linoleic Acid, Linolenic Acid, Lauryl Glucoside, Cucumis Melo Cantalupensis Fruit Extract, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Tocopherol, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Chloride, Polylysine.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Squeeze into your palm and gently massage over wet or dry skin.Add water to lather.Rinse well and pat dry.Use nightly or in alternation with other Drunk Elephant cleansers.Tip: Drunk Elephant recommends skipping the morning cleanse, as it's not necessary if you've cleansed your skin the night before.How to Recycle:No need to disassemble. The whole thing is recyclable!

reviews.headline: Wonderful Facial Cleanser
reviews.comments: I have sensitive skin and I use this cleanser daily. It leaves my skin clean but not dry.

reviews.headline: i am obesessed
reviews.comments: perfect gentle cleanser for sensitive skin

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Bought this for my daughter and she absolutely loves it! Will buy again in a larger size now that we tried the smaller size.

reviews.headline: Pore clogging ingredients
reviews.comments: Broke me out so bad when nothing else in my routine had changed except for this moisturizer

reviews.headline: Never buy this if you have sensitive skin
reviews.comments: Never my fce was burning red im going to renurn it

reviews.headline: Love!!!!
reviews.comments: I have sensitive skin and wanted to try this out it's so good it's hydrating and  gentle.

reviews.headline: A little goes a long way
reviews.comments: I only use this after a sweaty workout session or for summer days. This cleanser cleanses well without stripping the skin. It lathers nicely and a little goes a long way. Since I'm always washing my hands, the skin there is super sensitive and eczema prone. The cleanser can irritate my hands so I use my foreo with the cleanser instead which seemed to help and as needed on face for the TLC it deserves. Gifted by drunk elephant

reviews.headline: Perfect!
reviews.comments: Beste has to be one of the all time best cleansers! It's a gel that foams up beautifully but isn't at all harsh or drying. The packaging is cute and convenient for travel too. Highly recommend to everyone I know Gifted by Drunk Elephant for my honest review

reviews.headline: amazing
reviews.comments: the drunk elephant skin cleanser is a great light weight face wash i like how it makes my skin feel super clean and it's super gentle enough to use every day I highly recommend it as an everyday wash gifted by drunk elephant

reviews.headline: Just okay
reviews.comments: While this cleanser does a good job of washing your face and leaves the skin feeling soft and hydrated, I wouldn't recommend using it to remove makeup—especially around the eyes. I tried using it on my eyes, but it stung and burned. I'll admit I didn't read the back beforehand, which does say to avoid the eye area, but I found it disappointing that a cleanser marketed for makeup removal isn't gentle enough for the eyes—where makeup, especially mascara, tends to be the most stubborn. Gifted by drink elephant

reviews.headline: Just okay
reviews.comments: While this cleanser does a good job of washing your face and leaves the skin feeling soft and hydrated, I wouldn't recommend using it to remove makeup—especially around the eyes. I tried using it on my eyes, but it stung and burned. I'll admit I didn't read the back beforehand, which does say to avoid the eye area, but I found it disappointing that a cleanser marketed for makeup removal isn't gentle enough for the eyes—where makeup, especially mascara, tends to be the most stubborn. Gifted by drink elephant

reviews.headline: LOVE!!!
reviews.comments: I've been using Drunk Elephant Beste™ No. 9 Jelly Cleanser, and I'm really impressed. It's a super gentle formula that removes all my makeup, sunscreen, and oil without making my skin feel tight or stripped. The gel lathers nicely and rinses off clean, leaving my face soft and refreshed. I love that it's free from harsh ingredients like fragrance and silicones, making it perfect for my sensitive skin. Plus, it hydrates while it cleanses, thanks to glycerin, so my skin feels balanced afterward. Definitely a must-have for anyone looking for a gentle, effective cleanser! Gifted by drunkelephant

reviews.headline: Non drying!
reviews.comments: This was gifted by Drunk Elephant to me for my honest review, and honestly—I love it! The Jelly Cleanser is super gentle but still manages to leave my skin feeling really clean and refreshed. It doesn't strip my skin or make it feel tight, which is a huge win for me. I also love that it doesn't have a strong scent. It's now my go-to morning and evening cleanser!

reviews.headline: Obsessed
reviews.comments: I use this facial cleanser morning and night. It does not strip my skin yet it removes all my make up, oil, and sunscreen from throughout the day. It has a fresh scent, but it's not too strong. Gifted by drunk elephant

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: I love this cleanser. It is my new favorite product from drunk elephant. I highly recommend for those who have sensitive acne prone skin. It smells great too! This product was gifted by drunk elephant.

reviews.headline: gentle cleanser for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I was gifted by Drunk Elephant to give my honest review about the No.9 Jelly Cleanser ti give my honest review. I think it's a gentle and efficient cleanser for sensitive/dry skin. I only used it when I needed to remove my makeup at the end of the day. It didn't strip out my skin.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments:
Complimentary from Drunk Elephant 
I'm really liking this face wash! I've been using it for two weeks now and have replaced my regular face wash with it. My skin feels clean without being stripped and it doesn't leave any kind of residue. It also has a light fresh scent!

reviews.headline: Loved
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this cleanser.I am usually not a fan of cleansers that have a scent to them so I was very pleased that this one had not scent. I will definitely be buying after I am done with the product. Gifted by drunkelephant

reviews.headline: I would buy it
reviews.comments: I really like this jelly cleanser it felt good on the skin and didn't irritate my skin. The texture was pretty nice aswell and felt soft when applying to my face, overall I'm pretty satisfied (complimentary from drunkelephant)

reviews.headline: i LOVE
reviews.comments: i loved the consistency of this jelly cleanser. it felt really nice on the skin and removed my full face of makeup. it left my skin feeling soft and not dry at all. i feel like my face is on the sensitive side & this did not affect my skin in a negative way. gifted by drunkelephant

faceoff_positive.comments: So, I personally love this product and would recommend to everyone! It is a light face wash that makes me feel soft and clean. After a long night of work this helps me to feel nice and fresh in my skin! Please sponsor me!
faceoff_positive.headline: PLEASE USE THIS FACE WASH!

faceoff_negative.comments: I didn't love this product. It was a very basic cleanser, and I actually broke me out. I think that it's overpriced, and doesn't do much. Although it might work for some people, I just didn't like it.
faceoff_negative.headline: it's ok
